name: Wrapped USDC
description: Wrapped USDC on Stacks (xUSD) is a 1:1 equivalent of USDC on the Stacks network. Wrapped.com lets investors use their digital assets to lend, borrow, and trade on all major DeFi platforms. Wrapped.com is a collaboration of Tokensoft Inc. with custodians and other financial institutions. Tokensoft provides the technology layer via Wrapped.com that allows users to wrap their USDC into xUSD.
